title: NVIDIA Corp. stock rises Friday, outperforms market
text:
Shares of NVIDIA Corp. 
        NVDA,
        +0.12%
       advanced 3.12% to $942.89 Friday, on what proved to be an all-around poor trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index 
        SPX,
        +0.11%
       falling 0.14% to 5,234.18 and Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       falling 0.77% to 39,475.90. This was the stock's fifth consecutive day of gains. NVIDIA Corp. closed $31.11 below its 52-week high ($974.00), which the company reached on March 8th. Trading volume (58.2 M) eclipsed its 50-day average volume of 54.8 M. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights, an automation technology provider, using data from Dow Jones and FactSet.  See our market data terms of use. Despite protests from the bears, the calm is likely to last.
